issue.title: Replace npmcdn.com with unpkg.com
issue.body: To avoid potential naming conflicts with npm, npmcdn.com is being renamed to unpkg.com. This is an automated pull request to update your project to use the new domain.

issue.title: Live camera mode
issue.body:
## Feature: Camera Mode We should make use of the hamburger menu and create options to toggle on a live feed with Romanova. The menu should also have a description option. Implementation technique is up to you (make it lookk nice 👍 ). **Ideas:**
Camera Mode
Full Screen
Menu @A-Beltran @HecticHiccups @soconnor129

issue.title: Feature: Image Upload
issue.body:
## Upload to Background We need an optional image upload button like the one we had before, but have it right below our current button. The Images need to appear in the background or some where so its clearer to the user what is going on and what the text is about. @A-Beltran @HecticHiccups @soconnor129 **would be nice to have:**
semi-transparent background
Hamburger Menu
